segments.text: Excuse me . Do you happen to have a gym here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . I think you'll find our gym quite satisfactory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , where do I go to exercise ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's only one flight down , sir . Just take the elevator or the stairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I going to be charged extra for using the gym ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , you can use the gym for free . All you need is your room key .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! Now tell me , what are the hours of this gym ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , our gym is open around the clock , every day of the week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Do you have a trainer to help me work out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir , but we have no trainer .
segments.speaker: S2
